title: Sen. Kamala Harris | Rudy Giuliani Butt-Dials Reporter; Trump Booed at World Series: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump getting booed at the World Series a few days after his lawyer butt-dialed a reporter.

Then, Senator Kamala Harris talks about the death of Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi, the impeachment inquiry into President Trump and Rudy Giuliani’s ability as a lawyer. Plus, she talks about getting caught by a reporter talking about moving to Iowa and reacts to Maya Rudolph playing her on SNL.

After that, she took a few more questions with Late Night's Henry Melcher backstage at Studio 8G exclusively for this podcast.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
